title: High Noon Yasuo Skin sound bug [GAMEPLAY]
body: If you have ever used the high noon Yasuo skin you probably have noticed that his q has a gunshot sound effect to it. Well recently I've used this skin and the gunshot sound does not go off. I've tested it in a ranked game and custom and didn't work either times. None of my friends could hear it going off either. {{champion:157}}

replies.body: Yup! Lemme know if you're not hearing it. :]
